title: Shop (weird amumu drawing)
body:
I was browsing in the shop and suddenly a weird amumu drawing appears. Maybe its normal but normally when the session is expired you get the commando galio telling your session is expired. But I got that instead

Please tell me if this is normal because I have never seen that . 


PS : Tried logging in and out twice but still can't do anything

[]https://opx.s-ul.eu/S8jtULr8

Photo from another summoner who has the same problem

His post : [http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/UaIAc0iJ-wat-dis]

PS2 : Looks like the issue is resolved for me

replies.body: Lemme just say that this is creepypasta shit

Hey cllara,

We're currently investigating this issue. Thanks for the report!
Last update! Looks like the issue is resolved! Store access and Hextech crafting access should be back to normal. Thanks!
Im currently facing the same issue and cant seem to find a way to fix it...help plzzz

Reminds me of this old gem I stumbled upon way back when.

http://i61.photobucket.com/albums/h50/StarwindPhoto/gragas.jpg
As a quick update, we are working to get the Store back up now. I recommend checking out the [service status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) for updates!
Yeah I got the same issue.. At the same exact time. Weird..
